title: LET’S CALL IT A SPRITZ
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
ingredients: 6 cl Sparkling Wine or Pet Nat (Erik used Lindenlaub - Apres l’Heure PetNat)
instructions: *Honey Water: Honey in equal parts of warm water (chilled). Shake all above, follow by straining into your favorite high ball glass with tons of ice. Enjoy!

title: Pickled Midsummer
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
ingredients: A dried dill sprig for garnish
instructions: Shake the above with ice and double strain into a Nick & Nora glass, garnish with dried dill. *The pickle juice is made from the botanicals of our Akvavit - juniper berries, angelica root, coriander seeds, heather, elderflower, caraway & fennel seeds, that are mixed together with water, apple cider vinegar and sugar.

title: Stockholm Calling
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Mix everything on ice in a highball glass. Top up with the soda. Garnish with your summer flower of choice.

title: Puffran
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a coupe glass and squeeze a piece of orange zest over the glass.

title: Svart & Tonic
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Pour Svart and tonic water over tons of ice in a good looking glass. To spice it up, garnish with a slice of lemon or orange.

title: Lilla Bleckan
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Mix everything except the cream. Pour into four smaller glasses and top with lightly whipped cream. If available, sprinkle some Nigella seeds on top.

title: B(l)ackflip
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Shake Svart, bourbon, heavy cream, simple syrup and the egg in a shaker filled with ice, then double strain into a glass. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
